name: Color Maze (GorinichSerpant)
description:
This a game for the Rocky Mountain Game Dev Jam of 2020.  Each player tries to traverse a maze to reach goal before the other. The black pawn can only walk on light grey squares while the white pawn can only walk on dark grey ones. The tricky parts is that each square is randomly colored as well!

This game was programmed and designed by Daniel Boiko and Boris Shapoval.

The font was gotten from Jack Oatley's  Ikkle Font Pack. https://jackoatley.itch.io/ikkle-font-pack

The music was gotten from Patrick de Arteaga. https://patrickdearteaga.com

The one sound effect was gotten off of noiseforfun.com https://www.noiseforfun.com/2013-sound-effects/bump/
